name: Green Hanny
description: A mysterious, magical creature made of clay

actions.name: Hanny Flash
actions.description: Pierces through defenses, dealing a set amount of damage

actions.name: Trident Poke
actions.description: A quick stab with a trident

name: Okayu Fever
description: A being resembling a statue with many arms and a dangerous poison

actions.name: Okayu Virus
actions.description: A potent toxin that reduces defense

actions.name: Hand Crush
actions.description: The Fever crushes you between its palms

name: Squidman
description: A squid with two human legs sticking out from undereath, allowing it to walk on land

actions.description: Squidman flails its tentacles at our hero, dealing minimal damage
Squidman squirts some of its ink, reducing evasion
